title: No Solution For Western Sahara Except Through a Self-Determination Referendum
content: The Western Sahara issue can only be settled permanently and fairly through a fair and transparent self-determination referendum under UN supervision, the Council of the Nation, chaired by Salah Goudjil, said on Thursday in a press release. The Council reiterated its firm affirmation that the Western Sahara issue โcannot find a path to a permanent and just settlement except by enabling the proud Sahrawi people to exercise their right to self-determination within the framework of a fair and transparent referendum under the supervision and responsibility of the United Nations.โ In this context, the National Assembly considered the US State Departmentโs confirmation of the United Statesโ position on the just Sahrawi cause to be โa deviation from international legitimacy, which is supposed to be respected by a permanent member of the UN Security Council.โ He pointed out that this position โwill feed the ambitions of the Moroccan colonialist regime with illusory victories, which cannot change the facts of history or circumvent its inevitability, which despises and rejects colonialism, no matter how long it lasts.โ It will also โundermine past international efforts to consolidate UN solutions and enable the Sahrawi people to exercise their legitimate right to self-determination and independence, in accordance with the agreed-upon legal framework represented by the 1991 UN Settlement Plan,โ the source added. Based on the Algerian stateโs position expressed in the statement issued by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the National Community Abroad, and African Affairs on Wednesday, April 9, 2025, the Council of the Nation emphasized that the Sahrawi issue โhas a unique legal nature, namely that of decolonization, as established in all relevant international and regional resolutions, and is registered with the same legal status on the agenda of the Fourth Committee of the United Nations General Assembly and its resolutions, which enshrine the right of the Sahrawi people to self-determination.โ In this context, the National Peopleโs Assembly reiterated that the solution to the Sahrawi issue lies in adherence to the settlement plan agreed upon by the Polisario Front and the Kingdom of Morocco in 1991, which established the MINURSO Mission for the Referendum in Western Sahara, based on the Sahrawi peopleโs right to self-determination. The same source explained that โthe solution lies in adhering to the settlement plan agreed upon by the two parties in 1991 under the auspices of the Organization of African Unity (now the African Union) and the United Nations. This plan was unanimously approved by the Security Council, which established the MINURSO Mission for the Referendum in Western Sahara, based on the Sahrawi peopleโs right to self-determination.โ The Council stated that it had followed with โdeep regretโ the content of the press release issued by the US State Department, which โsupports the expansionist approach of the Moroccan occupation against the Sahrawi Arab Republic, in a manner inconsistent with previous US positions based on the values of peace, freedom, justice, and the right of peoples to self-determination.โ โThis position is not consistent with international legitimacy, as reflected in the resolutions of the United Nations General Assembly and the Security Council, as well as the resolutions and rulings issued by international, African, and European judicial bodies,โ the council added. These resolutions and judgments affirm โthe legal character of the issue as a matter of decolonization, following General Assembly resolution 1514 (XV) of the Declaration on the Granting of Independence to Colonized Countries and Peoples, which affirms that the subjection of peoples to alien subjugation, domination and exploitation constitutes a denial of fundamental human rights, is contrary to the Charter of the United Nations, and is an impediment to the promotion of world peace and cooperationโฆโ

title: El-Djeich Magazine: Armed Forcesโ Historical Responsibility in Protecting Borders
content: The Armyโs High Command emphasized that victorious Algeria is taking giant strides toward comprehensive development and progress through massive strategic projects and is now firmly advancing on the path to advancement and prosperity. The editorial in the latest issue of El-Djeich magazine, titled โSecuring the Present for a Brighter Future,โ asserted that โvictorious Algeria is today taking giant strides toward comprehensive development and progress through massive strategic projects that, until recently, seemed unattainable, even a fantasy to some slackers.โ The magazine noted that these achievements confirm that โAlgeria is now firmly on the path to progress and prosperity, confidently moving toward securing its present and looking forward to a brighter futureโ. The magazine added that โwhat has been achieved in various fields and in a relatively short time proves this, particularly in the areas of food, water and health security, and many other fields, according to the vision of a wise leadership that places Algeriaโs interests and sovereignty above all else.โ The militaryโs mouthpiece explained that โall development projects approved by President Abdelmadjid Tebboune and implemented on the ground serve the citizen and meet their needs, based on the consecration of the social character of the Algerian state, derived from the literature of the victorious liberation revolution, particularly the November 1st Declaration.โ In this context, the magazine noted โthe Presidentโs affirmation, in his last regular meeting with the national media, of his commitment to maintaining the same approach, ensuring further gains at various levels, particularly those that benefit youth, who represent the foundation and core of the nationโ. In contrast, the editorial praised this important segment of society, imbued with a patriotic spirit and driven by a strong will to achieve all the set goals, as emphasized by the President of the Republic. Considering that security and development are two complementary elements, the magazine highlighted the pivotal role of the Peopleโs National Army as a fundamental guarantee for the continuation of this development process within a framework of security and stability. Noting that, โin a regional environment witnessing increasing volatility and security challenges, our armed forces assume a historic responsibility to protect our vast borders, combat terrorism and organized crime in all its forms, and preserve the integrity of our national territory and the sovereignty of the state by working relentlessly to acquire deterrent military powerโ. In a different context, the editorial addressed the commemoration of the International Day for Mine Awareness, recalling the crime of mine-laying by French colonialism, which โkilled tens of thousands of Algerians who bravely held on to their ancestral land and defended it with unparalleled ferocity, sacrificing their lives to stop the inhuman crimes perpetrated by the hateful occupier in our country.โ โBecause Algeria, a country of challenges, cannot face any obstacle without overcoming it with an unwavering will of steel, our country had to rid itself of this legacy, and this is what happened thanks to the efforts of the nationโs sons, who did their utmost to achieve this goal,โ the editorial concluded.

title: Cherfa sโest rรฉunit avec la commission chargรฉe de lโimportation des moutons de lโAรฏd
content: Le ministre de lโAgriculture a prรฉsidรฉ samedi une rรฉunion de la commission nationale chargรฉe de lโimportation des moutons de lโAรฏd. Le ministre de lโAgriculture, du Dรฉveloppement rural et de la Pรชche, Youcef Cherfa a prรฉsidรฉ, samedi, une rรฉunion de la commission nationale chargรฉe de lโimportation des moutons de lโAรฏd, consacrรฉe ร lโexamen du plan prรฉliminaire de dรฉroulement des diffรฉrentes รฉtapes de lโopรฉration, a indiquรฉ un communiquรฉ du ministรจre. Cette rรฉunion de coordination sโest tenue au siรจge du ministรจre avec la participation des secrรฉtaires gรฉnรฉraux des secteurs concernรฉs (Agriculture, Intรฉrieur, Finances, Transports, Travail, Industrie et Commerce intรฉrieur), ainsi que des reprรฉsentants de la Gendarmerie nationale, de la Sรปretรฉ nationale et des Douanes. Ont pris part รฉgalement ร cette rรฉunion, les directeurs des services agricoles des wilayas dโAlger, Blida, Bouira, Boumerdรจs et les directeurs des entreprises รฉconomiques concernรฉes par lโopรฉration. Lors de cette rรฉunion, les membres de la commission ont examinรฉ le plan opรฉrationnel incluant des dรฉtails prรฉcis concernant le calendrier dโimportation des moutons, ainsi que les conditions de leur rรฉception au niveau des ports et leur transport direct vers les zones de mise en quarantaine, en prรฉvision de leur distribution sur les points de vente recensรฉs par les service de wilayas, tout en assurant le contrรดle sanitaire et sรฉcuritaire par les services compรฉtents. A cet รฉgard, le ministre a donnรฉ des instructions pour lโinstallation dโune commission technique restreinte composรฉe des secteurs concernรฉs, afin de procรฉder ร la rรฉpartition des quotas des moutons pour chaque wilaya, de dรฉfinir les modalitรฉs dโorganisation des points de vente et de fixer la date de lancement de la vente aux citoyens, selon la mรชme source.

title: French Justice Charges Two Algerians in Year-Old Incident
content: Developments in Algerian-French relations reveal that officials in Paris are not serious about maintaining their positions aimed at easing tensions, as Emmanuel Macron expressed in his phone call with President Abdelmadjid Tebboune on March 31, which paved the way for the subsequent visit of Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs Jean-Noรซl Barrot to Algeria. The latest development contradicting the statements of French officials is evidenced by a French justice decision to bring charges against three Algerians, one of whom enjoys diplomatic immunity, according to the public news agency Agence France-Presse (AFP) and the website France 24, which is under the jurisdiction of the French Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Whatever the reasons for this issue, it is not recent because it dates back to a year ago. This incident occurred less than two weeks after the release of a joint statement between the two countries, which outlined a new roadmap to re-establish cooperation between the two countries on a new basis, following an eight-month diplomatic rift after Franceโs blatant supportive stance toward the Moroccan regime regarding the Western Sahara issue. According to sources who spoke about the case, the body that oversaw and continues to oversee the investigation is the General Directorate of Internal Security (DGSI), an institution under the Interior Ministry, which is led by Bruno Retailleau, a prominent far-right figure, who has made targeting Algeria a political platform for his campaign for the leadership of the right-wing Republicans party (LR), in anticipation of the larger goal of the upcoming French presidential election in 2027. This incident represents a new blow to the recent rapprochement. France 24 reported that the issue โwill further complicate the already troubled relationship between Paris and Algeria,โ a reading that any observer could conclude, as the Algerian sideโs response will be at or above the level of provocation. Bruno Retailleau is leading resistance from within Franรงois Bayrouโs government against the appeasement policy the French president is attempting to pursue with Algeria. When the รlysรฉe Palace decided to remove the Algeria file from Bruno Retailleauโs hands and confine it to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Retailleau threatened to resign from the government. This would mean its collapse, as the alliance between Macronโs party and the right remains fragile following the defeat suffered by the French presidentโs party, Renaissance, in last summerโs legislative elections. The French judiciaryโs accusation of Algerian nationals cannot be dismissed as part of the resistance policy Bruno Retailleau is attempting to pursue in the face of Macronโs policy of appeasement with Algeria. He believes that the two sides would not have come together at the negotiating table without his plan, which he called a โgradual response.โ After a period of silence following the withdrawal of the Algerian file from his hands, Bruno Retailleau returned to criticizing the appeasement policy adopted by Macron and entrusted to his Foreign Minister. He criticized the results of the recent visit by Jean-Noรซl Barrot to Algeria on April 6, because the release of Boualem Sansal did not occur as he had hoped. French President Emmanuel Macron also returned to discussing the freedom of Franco-Algerian writer Boualem Sansal, who is serving a prison sentence by court order. Although the tone was supplicatory, experts consider this to be blatant interference in the internal affairs of Algeria, a sovereign state. Meanwhile, the French judicial system is blatantly turning a blind eye to the refusal to hand over the corrupt wanted fugitive, former Industry Minister, Abdeslam Bouchouareb, who has been the subject of numerous judicial requests, as confirmed by previous remarks of the Algerian Foreign Ministry.

title: Le FFS appelle ร un front national uni face aux dรฉfis intรฉrieurs et extรฉrieurs
content: Le premier secrรฉtaire national du Front des forces socialistes (FFS), Youcef Aouchiche, a appelรฉ, samedi ร Alger, ร construire un front national uni capable de relever les dรฉfis intรฉrieurs et extรฉrieurs. Sโexprimant lors de lโouverture des travaux dโune confรฉrence du parti intitulรฉe: โLa communication politique et le monde dโaujourdโhuiโ, Youcef Aouchiche a appelรฉ ร โconstruire un front national uni capable de protรฉger la dรฉcision nationale et de faire face aux dรฉfis intรฉrieurs et extรฉrieursโ. โLa souverainetรฉ nationale se construit et se renforce par la conscience, lโorganisation et la cohรฉsion entre le peuple et ses forces vives. Elle se fonde sur une vision vers un objectif suprรชme : une Algรฉrie unieโ, a-t-il dรฉclarรฉ. Le secrรฉtaire national du FFS a รฉvoquรฉ, par ailleurs, les massacres commis ร Ghaza par lโoccupant sioniste, affirmant quโil โsโagit lร non seulement dโune tragรฉdie humaine, mais plutรดt dโun crime historique contre un peuple sans dรฉfense dont le seul tort est de revendiquer le droit ร la vie sur sa propre terreโ. โMalgrรฉ les bombardements, la famine, la destruction et le blocus, la tรฉnacitรฉ des Palestiniens et leur attachement ร leur terre sont la rรฉponse la plus รฉloquente ร toutes les tentatives dโextermination et dโeffacement et la preuve รฉclatante de lโรฉchec de tous les projets de dรฉplacement et de dรฉracinementโ, a-t-il poursuivi. Aouchiche a renouvelรฉ le soutien du FFS au peuple palestinien et ร sa rรฉsistance lรฉgitime, appelant toutes les forces nationales et les hommes libres dans le monde ร โse mobiliser pour exiger lโarrรชt immรฉdiat de lโagression, la levรฉe du blocus et la traduction des criminels de guerre devant la justice internationale, et ร intensifier le soutien matรฉriel, politique et humanitaire aux habitants de Ghazaโ.

title: Saisie de 66 kg de cocaรฏne ร Adrarย
content: Soixante-six (66) kg de cocaรฏne ont รฉtรฉ saisis, vendredi ร Adrar, lors dโune opรฉration qualitative effectuรฉe par des dรฉtachements combinรฉs de lโArmรฉe nationale populaire (ANP), des Douanes algรฉriennes et de la Sรปretรฉ nationale, indique dimanche un communiquรฉ du ministรจre de la Dรฉfense nationale (MDN). ยซDans le cadre de la lutte contre la criminalitรฉ organisรฉe multiforme et dans la continuitรฉ des efforts visant ร endiguer le flรฉau du narcotrafic dans notre pays, des dรฉtachements combinรฉs de lโArmรฉe nationale populaire, des Douanes algรฉriennes et de la Sรปretรฉ nationale ont apprรฉhendรฉ vendredi 11 avril 2025, lors dโune opรฉration qualitative effectuรฉe au niveau du secteur militaire dโAdrar en 3e Rรฉgion militaire, un narcotrafiquant et saisi 66 kilogrammes de cocaรฏneยป, prรฉcise la mรชme source. ยซCette opรฉration de qualitรฉ confirme, une nouvelle fois, la grande vigilance et la ferme dรฉtermination des forces de lโANP mobilisรฉes le long des frontiรจres nationales, ร lutter contre la criminalitรฉ organisรฉe et ร prรฉserver la stabilitรฉ et la sรฉcuritรฉ du paysยป, ajoute le communiquรฉ.

title: ุบุฒุฉ ุชุจุงุฏ ุชุญุช ุถุฑุจุงุช ุงูุฃูุบุงุฏ
